channel.title: Developer Blog on Archmage
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Blog on Archmage

item.title: Roadmap & The Graph
item.description: In the last round of Graph grants, Archmage was awarded a grant to build the supporting infrastructure to help The Graph grow. The main purpose of the grant was to deploy new subgraphs and a front end to provide tooling for market makers to make well-informed decisions as to where they should allocate their capital. Subgraphs Archmage has already released new Uniswap V3 subgraphs to the hosted service - Uniswap V3, and Uniswap V3 Minimal.
